name: dusk-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves a lampent into chandelure, a misdreavus into mismagius, or a murkrow into honchkrow.
short_effect: Evolves a Lampent into Chandelure, a Misdreavus into Mismagius, or a Murkrow into Honchkrow.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.
flavor_text.platinum: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.
